title: Ping issue - ctrl click (health, mana, etc) not working
body:
is this also going to get resolved? Cant seem to communicate my health / mana / level percentage any more.

Map pings cant be communicated without moving to the ping location on the map which is very annoying.

replies.body: Should be working I just tried it in game? I believe it should be alt click though not ctrl click
will check. it was just reflexive but you're probably right. Am operating on not a great deal of sleep.
Also heard about the yellow v ping missing
